text:
[Verse]
Woke up feeling so alive
Bright blue sky it makes me high
Birds are singing far and wide
Sunshine smiles I can't deny

[Verse 2]
Walk the streets it's pure delight
Every corner shining light
People laughing feeling right
In this town the day is bright

[Chorus]
Sunshine smiles on everyone
Makes us feel like we belong
Together we will sing this song
Sunshine smiles come on along

[Verse 3]
Ocean waves and sandy shores
Open windows open doors
Joyous hearts they just implore
For more sunshine to explore

[Chorus]
Sunshine smiles on everyone
Makes us feel like we belong
Together we will sing this song
Sunshine smiles come on along

[Bridge]
In the night we'll see the moon
But sunshine's coming very soon
Hold this feeling let it bloom
From dawn till dusk it fills the room
title: Sunshine Smiles
